verses.verse: <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> and an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to them that have <S%G2975>obtained<s%> <S%G2472>like<s%> <S%G2472>precious<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> with us <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and our <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied<s%> to you <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>

<S%G5613>According<s%> as his <S%G2304>divine<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> has <S%G1433>given<s%> to us <S%G3956>all<s%> things that pertain to <S%G2222>life<s%> and <S%G2150>godliness,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of him that has <S%G2564>called<s%> us to <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G703>virtue:<s%>

<S%G1223>Whereby<s%> <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G1433>given<s%> to us exceeding <S%G3176>great<s%> and <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G1862>promises:<s%> that by <S%G5130>these<s%> you might be <S%G2844>partakers<s%> of the <S%G2304>divine<s%> <S%G5449>nature,<s%> having <S%G668>escaped<s%> the <S%G5356>corruption<s%> that is in the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G1939>lust.<s%>

And <S%G846>beside<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G3923>giving<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4710>diligence,<s%> <S%G2023>add<s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G703>virtue;<s%> and to <S%G703>virtue<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge;<s%>
And to <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G1466>temperance;<s%> and to <S%G1466>temperance<s%> <S%G5281>patience;<s%> and to <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G2150>godliness;<s%>
And to <S%G2150>godliness<s%> <S%G5360>brotherly<s%> <S%G5360>kindness;<s%> and to <S%G5360>brotherly<s%> <S%G5360>kindness<s%> <S%G26>charity.<s%>

For if <S%G5023>these<s%> things be in you, and <S%G4121>abound,<s%> they <S%G2525>make<s%> you that you shall <S%G3756>neither<s%> be <S%G692>barren<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G175>unfruitful<s%> in the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

But he that <S%G3361>lacks<s%> <S%G3918><s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things is <S%G5185>blind,<s%> and <S%G3467>cannot<s%> <S%G3467>see<s%> <S%G3467>afar<s%> off, and has <S%G3024>forgotten<s%> <S%G2983><s%> that he was <S%G2512>purged<s%> from his <S%G3819>old<s%> <S%G266>sins.<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> the <S%G3123>rather,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> give <S%G4710>diligence<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2821>calling<s%> and <S%G1589>election<s%> <S%G949>sure:<s%> for if you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, you shall <S%G3364>never<s%> <S%G4219><s%> <S%G4417>fall:<s%>

For <S%G3779>so<s%> an <S%G1529>entrance<s%> shall be <S%G2023>ministered<s%> to you <S%G4146>abundantly<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> I will not be <S%G272>negligent<s%> to <S%G5279>put<s%> you <S%G104>always<s%> in <S%G5179>remembrance<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> things, <S%G2539>though<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> them, and be <S%G4741>established<s%> in the <S%G3918>present<s%> <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yes,<s%> I <S%G2233>think<s%> it <S%G1342>meet,<s%> as long as I <S%G1510>am<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G4638>tabernacle,<s%> to <S%G1326>stir<s%> you up by <S%G5279>putting<s%> you in <S%G5280>remembrance;<s%>

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> that <S%G5031>shortly<s%> I must <S%G595>put<s%> <S%G595>off<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> my <S%G4638>tabernacle,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has <S%G1213>showed<s%> me.

<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G4704>endeavor<s%> that you may be <S%G2192>able<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> my <S%G1841>decease<s%> to have <S%G5130>these<s%> things <S%G1539>always<s%> in <S%G3420>remembrance.<s%>

For we have not <S%G1811>followed<s%> cunningly <S%G4679>devised<s%> <S%G3454>fables,<s%> when we <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to you the <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G3952>coming<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> but were <S%G2030>eyewitnesses<s%> of his <S%G3168>majesty.<s%>

For he <S%G2983>received<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G1391>glory,<s%> when there <S%G5342>came<s%> <S%G5107>such<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> to him from the <S%G3169>excellent<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> I am <S%G2106>well<s%> <S%G2106>pleased.<s%>
And <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> which <S%G5342>came<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> we <S%G191>heard,<s%> when we were with him in the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G3735>mount.<s%>

We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a more <S%G949>sure<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G4397>prophecy;<s%> <S%G3739>whereunto<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> that you take <S%G4337>heed,<s%> as to a <S%G3088>light<s%> that <S%G5316>shines<s%> in a <S%G850>dark<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1306>dawn,<s%> and the <S%G5459>day<s%> <S%G5459>star<s%> <S%G393>arise<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts:<s%>

<S%G1097>Knowing<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> that <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> is of any <S%G2398>private<s%> <S%G1955>interpretation.<s%>

For the <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> <S%G5342>came<s%> not in <S%G4218>old<s%> <S%G4218>time<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G444>man:<s%> but <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> as they were <S%G5342>moved<s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>
